member.name: HANDLE_ACCESS_OPTIONS
member.summary: Defines the level of access that a handle has on files.

member.name: HANDLE_ACCESS_OPTIONS.HAO_READ_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: The handle can be used to read file attributes.

member.name: HANDLE_ACCESS_OPTIONS.HAO_READ
member.summary: The handle can be used to read the file.

member.name: HANDLE_ACCESS_OPTIONS.HAO_WRITE
member.summary: The handle can be used to write to the file.

member.name: HANDLE_ACCESS_OPTIONS.HAO_DELETE
member.summary: The handle can be used to delete the file.
